title: How to Flirt With a Boy when You Are 13 or 14

steps.title: Learn how to relax around guys.
steps.content: Learn how to relax around guys . Not many people like an uptight person who will adjust her makeup and hair every five seconds. The point is to not be so girly, but don't be one of the guys either. You will not be able to flirt unless you can find the perfect balance between a friend and someone who is clearly crushing on him.

steps.title: Practice flirting with people you don't know and ones that you most likely will never see again.
steps.content: Practice flirting with people you don't know and ones that you most likely will never see again. The mall would be the perfect place for this. Flirtatious behavior includes winking, making eye contact, smiling, and trying to make them laugh.

steps.title: Convince him to give you his jacket.
steps.content: Convince him to give you his jacket. When you're walking with him or standing next time say you're cold and ask him for a hug or ask if he has a jacket or sweatshirt, but don't give it back that day then the next day when you see him tell him you're sorry and smile at him.

steps.title: Flirt with your crush subtly.
steps.content: Flirt with your crush subtly. Preferably one that you are attracted to. Don't be annoying or pushy when you flirt. Leave him wanting more than just your flirting! Here are a few simple ways to flirt with him : Glance up at him until your eyes meet, then smile at him. Get him a soda, beverage, or candy to show you care about him. Make jokes and try to make him laugh-- be funny ! Smile and make eye contact with him. Place your hand on his knee or 'accidentally' brush up against him. With a guy who's close to you, sign notes to him with "Love," or "XOXO," for example, end a letter to him with "Love, Sam." Make friends with his friends and be sure you leave a good impression on them too! That way they will talk to the guy you like about you.
